steps.title: Foundations
steps.objective: Build essential groundwork for your career

children.title: Industry Fundamentals
children.objective: Understand the core concepts of technical director

children.title: Tools & Environment
children.objective: Set up your professional workspace
tasks: Research standard tools for technical director

steps.title: Core Skills Development
steps.objective: Master essential skills for technical director

children.title: Adapt Designers’ Work To The Performance Venue Proficiency
children.objective: Develop proficiency in adapt designers’ work to the performance venue
milestones: Complete adapt designers’ work to the performance venue course
Demonstrate adapt designers’ work to the performance venue usage
Pass adapt designers’ work to the performance venue quiz
resources: Adapt Designers’ Work To The Performance Venue Resources
tasks: Practice adapt designers’ work to the performance venue fundamentals
Apply adapt designers’ work to the performance venue in small scenarios

children.title: Adapt To Artists' Creative Demands Proficiency
children.objective: Develop proficiency in adapt to artists' creative demands
milestones: Complete adapt to artists' creative demands course
Demonstrate adapt to artists' creative demands usage
Pass adapt to artists' creative demands quiz
resources: Adapt To Artists' Creative Demands Resources
tasks: Practice adapt to artists' creative demands fundamentals
Apply adapt to artists' creative demands in small scenarios

children.title: Coordinate Technical Teams In Artistic Productions Proficiency
children.objective: Develop proficiency in coordinate technical teams in artistic productions
milestones: Complete coordinate technical teams in artistic productions course
Demonstrate coordinate technical teams in artistic productions usage
Pass coordinate technical teams in artistic productions quiz
resources: Coordinate Technical Teams In Artistic Productions Resources
tasks: Practice coordinate technical teams in artistic productions fundamentals
Apply coordinate technical teams in artistic productions in small scenarios

children.title: Coordinate With Creative Departments Proficiency
children.objective: Develop proficiency in coordinate with creative departments
milestones: Complete coordinate with creative departments course
Demonstrate coordinate with creative departments usage
Pass coordinate with creative departments quiz
tasks: Practice coordinate with creative departments fundamentals
Apply coordinate with creative departments in small scenarios

steps.title: Practical Application
steps.objective: Gain hands-on experience through projects or simulations

children.title: Applied Practice Project
children.objective: Apply core skills in a realistic scenario
prerequisites: adapt designers’ work to the performance venue
adapt to artists' creative demands
tasks: Select a real-world problem to solve

children.title: Advanced Capstone
children.objective: Demonstrate comprehensive mastery
prerequisites: adapt designers’ work to the performance venue
adapt to artists' creative demands
coordinate technical teams in artistic productions

steps.title: Specialization
tasks: Research trending specializations in technical director

children.title: Specialization Track
children.objective: Deep dive into a specific area
prerequisites: adapt designers’ work to the performance venue
adapt to artists' creative demands

steps.title: Career Launch
steps.objective: Land your first role in the field

children.title: Professional Branding
children.objective: Create compelling professional presence
tasks: Highlight key skills: adapt designers’ work to the performance venue, adapt to artists' creative demands, coordinate technical teams in artistic productions

children.title: Job Search Strategy
children.objective: Execute systematic job search
tasks: Identify top companies for technical director
